column1: Impeachment is a grave & solemn matter. It's a stress test for our democracy. I hope every Senator is prepared to seriously consider & vote honestly with an open mind for the future of our democracy. (3/3)

As the only member of Congress who has participated as part of the Judiciary Committees for all three modern impeachment proceedings I must be clear that this is not something I sought or relish. (2/3)

It is with honor & determination that I accept this responsibility to fulfill my oath of office to hold the president accountable as an impeachment manager alongside @RepAdamSchiff @RepSylviaGarcia @RepValDemings @RepJeffries @RepJerryNadler & @RepJasonCrow. (1/3)

It's official 👇  @HouseJudiciary is starting an investigation into the Trump Admin’s "Remain in Mexico" policy which threatens the health & safety of legitimate asylum seekers including women children & families.  https://t.co/FIx9yAlfWE

I’m fighting for people living with pre-existing conditions in CA-19 & all around the country.  If the GOP’s Texas v US lawsuit strikes down the Affordable Care Act millions of Americans will lose vital protections & access to care.  We must #ProtectOurCare! https://t.co/UqN3EoJT6S

260 people from Santa Clara County sent me letters of support for the PFAS Action Act which I co-sponsored.  It requires the @EPA to: 🚫Stem the flow of PFAS contamination into the enviro 🔬Identify health risk associated with PFAS 🚱Limit human exposure to PFAS

Every day millions of Americans are exposed to unsafe levels of PFAS in their drinking water.  Today I voted to prevent the spread of these forever chemicals.  Next the Senate should join us in protecting public health.

Since Congress has not authorized military force against Iran my vote for @RepSlotkin's War Powers Resolution was an easy one that follows our Constitution.   We cannot have high-risk provocations of war without Congressional debate.

“My kids shouldn’t experience such things” Ms. Hekmati said. “They are US citizens. This is not OK.”  She is 100% correct. This is not OK at all & I'm working w/@RepJayapal @HouseJudiciary @OversightDems & @HomelandDems to demand answers for families.  https://t.co/9AwHo6juab

Thanks to everyone who took the time to reach out last year! I’m honored to work for engaged citizens who care about the direction of our country.  In 2020 I plan to continue fighting #ForThePeople of Santa Clara County & listening to your views.   📨📃📞https://t.co/4fx2fXBjr0 https://t.co/PFdDkBqYPm
On a policy basis there is reason to be concerned that this precipitous action may result in an unwanted new war that drags America into further military hostilities. 3/3

When responding to an attack or an imminent threat the President may act but must consult w/bipartisan Congressional leaders. Shockingly Pres. Trump consulted only w/Republican Congressional leaders an ominous departure that has chilling implications for our democracy. 2/3

The War Powers Act & our Constitution require that approval from Congress be obtained before starting an attack & a war. The President’s unwillingness to comply with the rule of law has real-life consequences for America. 1/3 https://t.co/ySXFYs85za

2 years ago Republicans rushed their #GOPTaxScam into law putting giant corporations & billionaires over working families.  2 years later wealth inequality in America is even worse.  @HouseDemocrats are fighting for an economy that works for everyone not just the privileged. https://t.co/jomQ59gXoQ

Announcing CA-19’s @CongressionalAC winner!  Avi’s Infinity News app is a creative & tech-savvy way of ensuring the public focuses on facts. I commend him for putting his skillset to use on a topic that matters around the world. #Congress4CS  📰➡️https://t.co/a14isfHzc8 https://t.co/lVtirui27z

I’ve worked on two prior presidential impeachments. This third time brings me no joy. It is a solemn but necessary occasion.  The President abused his power to upend the Constitutional order. It is our responsibility to use the tool our Founders gave us to preserve it. https://t.co/zsAyQzxL6c

Spoke to @HardballChris about the mood in DC & how this is really a depressing day.   It's a day when we as Members of Congress are required under our oaths of office to hold the president to account. When we are obligated to #DefendOurDemocracy. https://t.co/juaVeobbmO

The deadline to enroll in health insurance through Covered California has been extended to midnight on December 20!  Make sure you’re taking a look to find the best health care plan for you & your family. #GetCovered https://t.co/eYp0BEspll
Today I voted to proceed on articles of impeachment against Donald Trump.   My reflection ⬇️ https://t.co/6M6NViRX3a

I applaud my colleagues in the Senate for following the House’s lead & officially recognizing the Armenian genocide.  The persecution & murder of Armenians at the hands of the Turkish government was a crime against humanity. Proud that we are finally on the right side of history. https://t.co/po659lLEI3

I have said from day one that the Trump Administration’s Migrant Protection Protocols are illegal inhumane & just flat out wrong.   This tragedy was avoidable. This illegal program should be stopped today. https://t.co/RstdaoFLeZ
This is a serious moment for our country.  My full remarks from this evening’s @HouseJudiciary markup of articles of impeachment against Donald Trump ⬇️ https://t.co/FspeTa4qsq

Our #FutureFarmWorkforce bill just passed the House of Representatives!   Join @RepNewhouse @SpeakerPelosi & I along w/bipartisan reps ag groups & farmworkers as we discuss our historic compromise to help America’s farms.   WATCH ⬇  https://t.co/XER1stQBA9

Honored to stand w/@RepNewhouse & the rest of my colleagues on both sides of the aisle who have worked tirelessly on this historic compromise solution for farmers & farmworkers across the US.   My statement on the House floor in support of our #FutureFarmWorkforce bill ⬇️ https://t.co/a9SNbJoLyx

Yes it's true. We work together across the aisle in Congress!  We want to highlight our progress in the hopes that it may pave the way for future compromises.  #FutureFarmWorkforce @UFWupdates   📰w/ @RepNewhouse ⬇️ https://t.co/fYtQrSSMdw

Simply acknowledging #HumanRightsDay today isn’t enough.   China is undermining freedoms for #HongKongers + others. Saudi Arabia killed a US journalist w/impunity. Our Border Patrol has let children die in custody.  Rights are under threat around the globe. We cannot be silent. https://t.co/NBNGMpxri3

2 years ago @POTUS & @FCC repealed #NetNeutrality rules which means your provider can block throttle & charge extra for internet access.  @HouseDemocrats passed a bill to reinstate fair protections 244 days ago. It sits untouched in the Senate.  @SenateGOP: #DoYourJob https://t.co/oTlUuaqViQ
I also want to thank leaders @RepTerriSewell who authored #HR4 & @RepMarciaFudge who collected evidence from around the country to ensure the #VRAA will #RestoreTheVote! https://t.co/KoMCZvFV8K

Today @HouseDemocrats stood against voter suppression & passed #HR4 to restore the #VotingRights Act.   The right to vote is at the very core of our democracy. We won’t let it be compromised by adversaries abroad or undermined here at home. #RestoreTheVote https://t.co/HWZZAGll0I

The death of this child is heartbreaking & appears to have been entirely preventable.  This video proves CBP lied to us about their treatment of Carlos the sixth child to die in U.S. custody in under a year.  CBP must be held accountable & this must never happen again. https://t.co/ONLt1rN7aq

This is only the third time in modern history that @HouseJudiciary has assumed the grave responsibility of holding #impeachmenthearings.   I’ve been there all three times.   I'm questioning witnesses about the Constitutional grounds for presidential impeachment   LIVE⬇️ https://t.co/8fOq0zYhsf

Today @HouseJudiciary will examine the Constitutional framework put in place to address presidential misconduct (📸 getting ready to begin).  @HouseIntel has laid out the facts. Our job is to assess the level of danger posed to the Constitution & our national security. https://t.co/Lch87TrKqi

I'm evaluating testimony w/a grave sense of duty to the Constitution...  ...& I remind my colleagues of the words in this report (https://t.co/ZDxyUo5cgS): "The purpose of #impeachment is not personal punishment; its function is primarily to maintain constitutional government.” https://t.co/Kr7m0t6bVL
I don’t often agree with Judge Andrew Napolitano but I do agree with his top-line assessment here.  We must #DefendOurDemocracy https://t.co/S6lVMGH3t5

Happy Small Business Saturday!   Family-run small businesses in Santa Clara County are the backbone of our communities & our country’s economy. Be sure to support them & #shopsmall this holiday season.  What are your favorite local small businesses? https://t.co/m5qA0JrVP3

This #Thanksgiving I want to share my family’s favorite pecan pie recipe - it’s very good easy to make & even won first place at the Naglee Park July 4th Bake-Off! Hope you enjoy it. https://t.co/vIHaDlHDAU

The Trump Admin pursued its family separation policy knowing it lacked the ability to keep track of separated children & parents.  We will keep bringing DHS before us until we get to the bottom of this serious matter. Their callous cruelty is unacceptable. https://t.co/9pgOxPhUdP https://t.co/OMya2azqAV

While @POTUS tweets away about us “doing nothing”  300+ bipartisan bills passed by @HouseDemocrats are languishing in the Senate because Mitch McConnell said he won’t do anything without Trump’s approval.  They need to stop projecting & start passing our commonsense legislation. https://t.co/eNklVTmABY

Grateful to community members & elected officials who paved the way for @SCCgov's new Vietnamese-American Service Center.  This facility will help connect our community’s Vietnamese-Americans w/health & social services.  The first in the nation & it’s in our district! https://t.co/QlkyTlPUUF

Violence against women & girls is a serious & unacceptable global problem.   That’s why I am once again a cosponsor of the International Violence Against Women Act which codifies US efforts to prevent & combat gender-based violence worldwide.   Passage of #IVAWA is long overdue. https://t.co/EHq0TDrlmd

Since the start of this year we’ve passed more than 275 bipartisan pieces of legislation #ForThePeople.  They’re all stuck in the Senate sitting on Mitch McConnell’s desk.  That’s inexcusable.  @senatemajldr: #DoYourJob

Republicans say @HouseDemocrats only care about impeachment.  They’re wrong.  Just this week we’ve:  ✅Advanced my bipartisan ag workforce bill  ✅Voted to fund gov & give our troops a raise  ✅Voted to defend democracy in #HongKong  ✅Introduced a new bill to protect refugees
Fantastic news! This new investment will help make Silicon Valley’s Airport safer & more beneficial for travelers & first responders. More ⬇️ https://t.co/qDA3BXpuV2

This is un-American.  Right now there are more refugees than any time since WWII. It's a crisis.  The US used to lead the world in offering protection to victims of terror.  I introduced the #Refugee Protection Act w/@SenatorLeahy today to get us back to that American tradition. https://t.co/dVBieb6yim

Documented white nationalists don’t belong in any presidential administration.   Stephen Miller is a bigot who has used his position to demonize refugees & dismantle our immigration system.   He must go. Period. https://t.co/pkFaHnJPbH

Working with my colleagues to fix the damage done to our refugee programs by @POTUS & Stephen Miller.   America should once again be assisting the world's most vulnerable people. #UnitedWithRefugees #SaveAsylum https://t.co/37weuWSuvf

This momentous vote today in the @HouseJudiciary Committee moves my #FutureFarmWorkforce proposal w/@RepNewhouse forward!   Soon all Members will vote on the first bipartisan compromise in decades to improve America’s agricultural labor programs & laws. https://t.co/ghYz3soWs2

Last month @HouseDemocrats voted in support of democracy in #HongKong. Today the legislation passed both chambers of Congress.   The rights of #HongKongers are being violently repressed. This cannot be ignored. Anyone who cares about human rights should #StandWithHongKong https://t.co/ja2qCiSHyc

The workplace conditions described by Sidronio are not sustainable. We need to ensure that the working men & women who feed America are protected & treated fairly. #FarmWorkerStories #FutureFarmWorkforce https://t.co/bmXYq83BOl
We need to recognize the dignity & contributions of hardworking agricultural laborers like Alma. #FarmWorkerStories #FutureFarmWorkforce https://t.co/mDRokn0wDq

Amparo is right. Thousands of agricultural laborers are living & working in fear & it’s destabilizing farms across the country. We need to provide them w/certainty. #FarmWorkerStories #FutureFarmWorkforce https://t.co/wTqRyb8o6Z
Farmworkers like Adelaida are the backbone of our agricultural economy. We cannot ignore them. #FarmWorkerStories #FutureFarmWorkforce https://t.co/yIgRDgrGAX
Farmworkers like Jesús feed the nation. It’s important that we listen to their stories & provide agricultural laborers w/fairness. #FarmWorkerStories #FutureFarmWorkforce https://t.co/I071Lbk1Bg

Today @HouseJudiciary will consider our bipartisan Farm Workforce Modernization Act. It is essential for Congress to work together to address our nation’s future farm labor needs. Watch ⬇️ #FutureFarmWorkforce https://t.co/YIchdWy00z

Under no metric is Guatemala deemed safe.  It certainly doesn’t meet the legal standards for safe third country agreements.  Sending vulnerable families there is the latest illegal attempt by @POTUS & Stephen Miller to destroy our asylum system. https://t.co/CzWcVcyG2q

Reminder: @HouseIntel Cmte hears more #impeachment testimony today. As a member of @HouseJudiciary I'm listening like you are. (Live @ https://t.co/bbmYE2pZ83)   Up now: Lt. Col. Vindman will discuss what he heard directly on Trump’s call w/Ukraine. #DefendOurDemocracy https://t.co/ifdP6VQgTa

This piece explains key impeachment testimony so far (which paints a picture of a pressure campaign to corrupt our democracy): https://t.co/2FAt1PKBEZ   As @SpeakerPelosi said if Trump has something that's exculpatory he should make it known as we work to #DefendOurDemocracy.

Pleasure to meet w/San Jose Valley Christian Schools faculty member Danny Kim today.  Danny coached an award-winning team of CA-19 STEM students & young pioneers in the field of ocean engineering. Thank you for mentoring the next generation of innovators! https://t.co/GvilKfrgL2

Great to meet w/#UFW members who are in D.C. to advocate for our bipartisan Farm Workforce Modernization Act. Honored to author this bill that will bring stability to America’s farms & the workers who produce our food. #FutureFarmWorkforce https://t.co/1fRKvKRKXU
The facts are damning & so far not contested.   We must keep the process going in a serious methodical way to #DefendOurDemocracy. https://t.co/ZkyCXiY1kN

On this first day of public hearings for the #impeachment inquiry I spoke w/@RaziaIqbal on @BBCworldservice about how we must #DefendOurDemocracy.  🎙️Full interview: https://t.co/WsCNufHeo5 (starts @ 6:44) https://t.co/fbvF7UmPuC
Here’s an interesting read on the Trump-Erdogan relationship… https://t.co/LXWU8eWTGL

Last time Erdogan visited DC his bodyguards assaulted Americans exercising their right to protest.   I immediately called for the arrest of these thugs & revocation of their visas at the time & I’m appalled that Trump has welcomed this oppressor back without any repercussions. https://t.co/somen3YXJB

Today I was proud to Chair a @HouseAdm_Dems markup to unanimously pass H.R. 1980 the Smithsonian Women’s History Museum Act.  Women make up 51% of the population – it’s long past due that we have a national museum to tell #HERstory!

Proud to introduce the Survivors Bill of Rights in the States Act with @RepSpeier- building on the success @RiseNowUS & I achieved in 2016 to guarantee rights for survivors in federal law. This new bill encourages states to follow suit & support survivors. https://t.co/sNjnwj72BG

Happy #VeteransDay to all who have served our country.  @HouseDemocrats have passed 20+ bills to support veterans & their families. From expanding VA suicide prevention programs to ensuring veteran access to childcare we are committed to our servicemembers when they return home. https://t.co/BZtSpzbTUl

Legal protections for whistleblowers are crucial in order to fight waste fraud & abuse in government.   ⤴️ This has long-been a nonpartisan point of agreement & should remain so especially during these serious impeachment proceedings. https://t.co/Shsz3GvqsA

Thank you Larry.   @RepAnnaEshoo and I know that privacy for online consumers has been nonexistent & we’re working together to change that.  Our #DataPrivacyAct will give you control of your personal data by making legitimate changes to tech industry business practices.
“Silicon Valley has long been a cradle of innovation and it’s nice to see two Silicon Valley lawmakers introduce an innovative bill that could benefit Americans” - @larrymagid https://t.co/osuYr0JqWK
The names "Biden" & "Clinton" keep appearing in these depositions.  It makes Trump's goal clear – get Ukraine to smear his political opponents.  #DefendOurDemocracy https://t.co/Fojq7pW4nY

I trust the fact that the Ukrainians didn’t know that aid had been held- Jim Jordan 11/6/19  I encourage Rep. Jordan to read through these interviews.   Top Ukrainian officials certainly knew. It was central to Trump's pressure campaign & it almost worked.  #DefendOurDemocracy https://t.co/atfXEj1Aem
The deposition from US Ambassador to Ukraine Bill Taylor makes it clear that this pressure campaign was lead directly by President Trump.   We need to #DefendOurDemocracy. https://t.co/x3oSBqisuk

Thank you @EPICprivacy for grading the #OnlinePrivacyAct the top consumer data protection bill in Congress.   @RepAnnaEshoo & I consulted with 100+ academics businesses regulators & advocacy organizations to craft a comprehensive set of protections for users & their data. https://t.co/FwMbqlRhGc
Congrats @Apple for joining @Google & @facebook in committing billions to build housing people can afford. https://t.co/XUuYZOCK1O

Today @RepAnnaEshoo & I introduced the most robust data privacy bill to date.   The #OnlinePrivacyAct protects users encourages innovation & restores trust in tech companies.   More➡️https://t.co/BPNg8WM0wb https://t.co/JA4CyOzlMc

As Republicans falsely claim @HouseDemocrats only focus on impeachment it’s important to note we’ve passed 300+ bills & counting #ForThePeople on key issues like:  ✅Gun Violence ✅Healthcare ✅Election Security ✅Climate Change ✅LGBTQ Rights   @senatemajldr: #DoSomething

Fact: There are more refugees now than any time since WWII.  Fact: Your 2020 refugee admissions level is the lowest in US history.  Fact: There was bipartisan agreement in Congress to raise it. We were ignored.  Your policy isn’t based on the facts. It shocks the conscience. https://t.co/qldF2YBP1H

Working parents know better than anyone about the most pressing issues facing our country — & that’s why we need make it easier for working moms & dads to run for Congress.  Proud to have supported @RepKatiePorter’s bill to ensure working families are better represented in DC. https://t.co/nqQJkLg93t

Thank you @EzraKlein & @Voxdotcom for having me on to discuss my firsthand experience with the Nixon & Clinton impeachments.   It’s vital that everyone understands what impeachment means as the House continues its fact-finding investigation to #DefendOurDemocracy #ForThePeople. https://t.co/dZrtxPpuCi

As a Congressional staffer during Nixon’s #impeachment I saw a change happen – as the evidence piled up Members of Congress had to confront the facts & their obligation to the Constitution.  In the end there may be a clear choice: defend Donald Trump or #DefendOurDemocracy. https://t.co/epdfWa6ewb

Last week @HouseDemocrats passed my #SHIELDAct 🛡 to crack down on foreign interference in US elections. It’s the 3rd election security bill passed by the House to protect our democracy & now one of 300+ bills languishing in the #McConnellGraveyard. https://t.co/C1rOZc9VND

As #DomesticViolenceAwarenessMonth comes to an end my colleagues & I wore purple to show our support for the Violence Against Women Act.  ✅@HouseDemocrats voted to reauthorize #VAWA in April   ❌@senatemajldr continues blocking #VAWA which puts lives at risk https://t.co/QiTFiZTWHY

It's important that everyone understands what #impeachment means as the House votes on procedures for our fact-finding mission.  #Throwback to my chat on the @StephMillerShow about impeachment & Trump's misconduct.   #TruthExposed #NoOneIsAboveTheLaw 📻🎙️📢 https://t.co/5q3LEcJSyr

Thanks to @RepNewhouse & all of the members on both sides of the aisle who spent months working w/me on this bipartisan solution for our #FutureFarmWorkforce.  Republicans & Democrats working together for the good of the country is something to be proud of. 📷: @meganululani https://t.co/d78dnMETLo

HAPPENING NOW: I’m introducing new legislation to address our nation’s agricultural labor needs. The Farm Workforce Modernization Act will provide stability for America’s farms & the workers who feed our nation. #FutureFarmWorkforce  https://t.co/arRKRbkK70

HAPPENING SOON: We’re unveiling the Farm Workforce Modernization Act: a bipartisan bill to provide stability predictability & fairness for America’s farms.  Tune in live – in a half hour – 11:30am PST/2:30pm EST #FutureFarmWorkforce

300+ national security & foreign policy officials called it a “profound national security concern”.  17 Watergate prosecutors told us it met the same standard for Nixon’s impeachable conduct.  Trump’s own former NSC Advisor said it was absolutely inappropriate.  GOP: Take note https://t.co/wfE9uMlxci

The #ArmenianGenocide is indisputable & its denial has been used to justify subsequent atrocities.   I’ve supported genocide recognition efforts since I first came to Congress in 1994 & am proud to vote for #HRES296 on the House floor today.   Passing this bill is long overdue.
The answer he should have given is simple: NO.   I’m a @ConstitutionCtr Honorary Congressional Scholar & I don’t need legal jargon to come up with that one-word response. https://t.co/xXet8e8PsX

We need to correct this injustice & honor the contributions of ALL of the men & women who defend our country.   @HouseJudiciary is reviewing the impact of these immigration policies for veterans right now. Watch⬇️  https://t.co/XOIViKuMuI

In just 2 weeks we'll be honoring those who served our country on #VeteransDay...  ...& while this Administration makes a show of thanking servicemembers they'll keep despicably deporting immigrants who fought in our military & blocking naturalizations.  That's Un-American.

This is the next phase in our ongoing inquiry to determine whether Donald Trump should be impeached. The American people will soon hear for themselves in open hearings how the President abused his power & endangered our national security for personal gain. #TruthExposed https://t.co/fwvAtGvGWm

It’s difficult to defend the indefensible.   The President’s own top diplomats & national security experts are corroborating the mounting evidence that Trump abused his power for personal gain. #TruthExposed  https://t.co/O95wRJJFlW

This was long overdue. As today’s ruling shows the White House had no right to block @HouseJudiciary’s requests. I suspect we will soon have even more proof of this Administration’s misconduct. https://t.co/bcVC681adt

Last year San Jose joined several cities across the country to mourn the 11 innocent Americans murdered at the Tree of Life synagogue.  This weekend let us come together again to honor the victims & reaffirm that hate has no place in our communities. #ShowUpForShabbat https://t.co/lVj90AXSf4

Instead of capitulating to Erdogan Trump should:   1. Sanction Turkish officials responsible for these atrocities.  2. Stop selling arms to Turkey for use in Syria.  3. Revoke visas of Erdogan’s bodyguards who assaulted protestors on US soil.  4. Recognize the Armenian genocide.

Trump’s cowardly appeasement of authoritarian strongmen is emboldening Erdogan to act with impunity.   The US is supposed to condemn bad actors when they violate human rights & kill our allies not aid & abet them. https://t.co/mCeKrcG2Fl

Talked impeachment on @MorningJoe.  As I said to @MorningMika a lot of the info is in plain sight. The Pres. may have his own reality but there are actual facts.  @HouseDemocrats are working #ForThePeople #ForTheFacts.  #TruthExposed #SHIELDAct https://t.co/OMwvxuVDld

We are debating the #SHIELDAct🛡️ on the House Floor right now. This critical election security bill cracks down on foreign meddling in American elections & is expected to pass the House shortly. @HouseDemocrats continue fighting #ForThePeople. The Senate should follow our lead. https://t.co/TWVFeewlgl
Protecting American elections from foreign interference cannot wait. Congress needs to pass my #SHIELDAct 🛡️now.  I explain why on @SXMPOTUS @MorningBriefing ⤵️ https://t.co/2OVWUrryPF

Just as America's election security is being compromised by adversaries abroad our fundamental right to vote is being undermined here at home.  @HouseJudiciary must pass the #VotingRights Advancement Act to prohibit the disenfranchisement of Americans. #VRAA https://t.co/zVCiZtymgX

Trump’s campaign shared internal polling data with a Russian operative & the Russians then used Facebook’s geographic targeting features to hit Americans in specific locations with political ads.   ⤴️ This info sharing should be illegal.   It would be with my #SHIELDACT. https://t.co/za1oOSpxh4

We were joined by @DOJ @FBI @DHS & @EAC witnesses at today’s @HouseJudiciary #ElectionSecurity hearing.  @HouseDemocrats are investigating & moving proposals simultaneously.  Next up: #SHIELDAct w/bipartisan reforms to improve our elections’ defenses against foreign interference. https://t.co/6N2BcOnna6

Presidential campaigns shouldn’t be briefing Russian operatives on their election strategy & internal polling data but that’s exactly what Trump’s own campaign chairman did in 2016.  My #SHIELDAct cracks down on this info-sharing to keep foreign governments out of our democracy. https://t.co/dXvES2qCFC
No. https://t.co/asSpi9SNgw

The @HispanicCaucus @HouseJudiciary & @HomelandDems are demanding an investigation into this dangerous policy.  We will fight to ensure vulnerable families are treated humanely & receive access to legal representation & translators.⬇️ https://t.co/NKR1kZKEbH

The U.S. is legally obligated to thoroughly review asylum claims from families threatened with violence & murder in their home countries.  The Trump Admin is unlawfully funneling people into tent courts where their due process rights are violated. It's cruel & unacceptable. https://t.co/21VDROT5rk

The Constitution’s framers envisioned America’s political leaders as bound by a devotion to country above all else...By protecting Donald Trump at all costs from all consequences the Republicans risk violating that sacred oath. https://t.co/eI0XsKHix0
Couldn’t agree more. Thanks @Tim_Cook for urging the Senate to pass our bipartisan bill. https://t.co/trlmiu2LHq

Trump hosting the #G7 summit at his own property is a blatant #EmolumentsClause violation.   How can he accuse others of conflicts of interest when he consistently uses the office of the presidency for self-enrichment?   They aren't even trying to hide the corruption anymore. https://t.co/QgFddHiDEO

I consider myself honored to have worked with Elijah Cummings for more than 20 years in Congress.  @RepCummings refused to accept injustices & stood up for our core American values until the very end.  Our country has lost a champion.
All I see is the only woman at the table literally standing up to a bully. https://t.co/40Ci0ficBi

We cannot let foreign entities launder money & sow disinformation in our elections. It's the solemn duty of Congress to defend our democracy from these threats.    Today @HouseAdm_Dems passed my bill the #SHIELDAct to promote transparency & close gaps in our election laws. https://t.co/N71lP9Z82e

The Russian military is now in Northern Syria - while our U.S. tactical nukes (at a base in Turkey) are unsecured & our troops are isolated & in danger.   All because of the pullout ordered by Trump.    It makes me wonder: whose team is @RealDonaldTrump on?https://t.co/CQKzytIhjm

Democracy in #HongKong is under threat by the Chinese government.  Today the House of Representatives stands w/ #HongKongers by reaffirming U.S. commitment to their rights & suspending crowd control equipment sales to the police who are brutally targeting peaceful protesters. https://t.co/vNw7SlJsWn

Two years ago #MeToo sparked a national conversation about workplace harassment & sexual misconduct.   Since then we’ve reformed workplace protections afforded to congressional staff & interns to ensure that every survivor on Capitol Hill is heard.   We can & must do better.

Attention CA-19 innovators:   My office is accepting submissions for the 2019 Congressional App Challenge an incredible opportunity for Santa Clara County students interested in pursuing careers in computer science.   Visit ➡️ https://t.co/5aMnDIj0jq for more. https://t.co/HlyX6dlDu8

This is the 4th DHS Secretary to leave the Trump Admin. The latest instrument in advancing the immoral family separation policy.  What does America really need? A leader who upholds the rule of law stands up to the President & works w/Congress in a productive & bipartisan way. https://t.co/AgMc1RAqBh

Trump’s rule would have discriminated against working class families undermined legal immigration & harmed the nation’s public health. Pleased to see the Court uphold the rule of law & halt this unlawful regulation. More ➡️ https://t.co/mpXQAgEGUx https://t.co/0TvEvuPD4x
